body: Hi all, Maybe I am missing something but following on from the discussion here: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/ashrae-90-1...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/ashrae-90-1-wall-construction) It appears to me that the only a fraction of the constructions available in the OpenStudio components library are available in the current Honeybee Hive is this correct? If a construction is not available from the Honeybee hive what is the best way of applying a component from the building component library? I'd like to apply a construction like so as using the apply open studio measure seems a bit clunky in this case. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/S8fITn3IbtvFFAD4Y1MI0zm2eP4*CheOf7SPYG9K2QWFswCExikJPmpr54ln6Rv5Lo8BcbbfXRPKH30GqetzkemjK4fF6Krx/exampleworkflow.JPG) Your thoughts and comments are most appreciated!
topic: Building components library vs Honeybee construction library
